alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 11:34PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1215 AM MST... At 1133 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Magma, or near Florence, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Magma, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. This includes AZ Route 79 between mile markers 129 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County
